title: Why the economics of orbital AI are so brutal
description: A 1 GW orbital data center would cost roughly $42.4 billion — almost three times its ground-bound equivalent.
content: A 1 GW orbital data center would cost roughly $42.4 billion — almost three times its ground-bound equivalent.
